name: Shooting Range Simulator
description:
This game is an attempt for making a realistic handling for guns, this game allows for guns to stay unloaded and bolt to be cycled on your will

Controls:

WASD to move

Left Click to shoot primary

Middle Click to shoot underbarrel

Right Click to aim

G to pick up/throw weapon

T to slow down time

P to close app

O to delete casing and projectiles

Tab to change aiming point

Q to lean left

E to lean right

Tap R to rechamber

Tap R to open/close chamber

X to remove bullet/magazine

Z to load bullet/magazine

F1 to change fire mode

Tap F2 to toggle light

Hold F2 to toggle laser

To change attachments:

go to the table that's fixed and not moving

throw your gun over the table

press F to start changing attachments

to change it, press ` or ~ (next to 1) and aim at the white orbs

click on the icons

reclick on the icon to remove an attachment, note that you can't always remove it

Game is on heavy development, several missing stuffs such as icons and names are sometimes replaced by a placeholder, thank you for your understanding
